response.overview: In the Wuhan Herdling dialect, ‘lost’ means that a person has deviated from the normal course of life, not working, marrying, having children, or going mad, crazy, stupid, or committing suicide as most people do....... After making my first film and graduating from school, I chewed on my memories as my life became more and more repetitive. day to day repetitive life chewing on memories.
response.title: 牧畜岭丢魂
